apis.description: Get inventory data for the institution and also the count for each library of congress class

operations.summary: Get book call number count for the institution and also the count for each library of congress class
operations.notes: Retrieves the book call numbers count for a specific institution within the specified time window.

parameters.name: book_call
parameters.description: Specify which book call number to look up for the institution. If not specified returns the list of counts for each library of congress class.

parameters.name: book_call_end
parameters.description: Specify which book call number to end for the institution. If not specified returns the list of counts for each library of congress class.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify whether to return a file or echo output to page. Options are either raw or file. Defaults to raw.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify whether to return data in CSV or JSON. Options are either csv or json. Defaults to JSON.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Inclusive start date to query work activity. Specify with format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to one week ago from current date.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Exclusive end date to query work activity. Specify with format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to one week from start_date.
